title: Goal of rational emotive therapy is to help client

content.question: The goal of rational-emotive therapy is to help clients

choices.label: focus on the significance of childhood events for current feelings of self-worth
Correct self-defeating thoughts about their lives
practice relaxation techniques and autohypnosis to reduce anxiety
use introspection to alleviate their feelings of self-doubt

content.answer: Correct self-defeating thoughts about their lives

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
